name: DRAGONBALL NACHO VR
description:
I miss my dragonball super Weekly Episode, so i made a DragonBall super VR game 😜🎮

Wach the video and tell me if you want this game in comment if yes i will keep work on it ! 

Requirement : HTC vive and PC VR ready 

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 7
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon R9290
    • DirectX: Version 11
    RECOMMENDED:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 7
    • Processor: Intel Core i7
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070
    • DirectX: Version 11
